name: rustdom
description: Rust based DOM manipulation library for Node.js
author: Daniel Engelke <dengelke91@gmail.com>

scripts.watch-rs: cargo watch --quiet -i index.js -i test -i lib -- cargo-cp-artifact -nc index.node -- cargo build --message-format=json-render-diagnostics
scripts.watch-js: cargo watch --no-gitignore --postpone -i src -w index.node -w index.js -w test -w lib -- npm run test
